ComTalk_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Seems like that clothing item can't be
enhanced. Please choose something else.
ComTalk_025:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Seems like that clothing item can't be
enhanced. How about another piece
of clothing?
ComTalk_026:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That clothing item can't be enhanced with
my power alone. But if my sisters brought
their powers back into the world...
ComTalk_027:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If you want me to enhance that clothing
item,<sp:5:0:0> I will need the help of my sisters...
ComTalk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Any other clothing items you want me to
work on?
ComTalk_028:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Don't be unreasonable. Though, if my
sisters were awakened, it might be a
different story...
ComTalk_051:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There we go. Splendid quality, if I do say
so myself.
ComTalk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't enhance your clothing,<sp:5:0:0>
but let me tell you why...
ComTalk_029:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You... Please go help my sisters.
Doing so will allow me to enhance
that piece of clothing.
ComTalk_052:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Very good, very good. Yes, this is
fine work.
ComTalk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Oh! You don't have any clothes at all?
Well, if you get some, come back and
I'll see if I can enhance them for you.
ComTalk_053:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It turned out quite well. As is natural for
my blessing.
ComTalk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>...However, you are lacking any clothing
that I can enhance.

Here, <sp:5:0:0>let's take a look. Maybe I can
see what's stopping me from helping.
ComTalk_054:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Truly flawless work. Take it, and
be grateful.
ComTalk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can enhance your clothing
<clr:0000>a fair amount<clr:ffff>.
ComTalk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can <clr:0000>greatly<clr:ffff> enhance your clothing.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Away with you!<sp:5:1:0> I don't want anything to
do with a world ruined by gloom and ruled
by monsters!
It's cramped in my flower bud, but better
than out there.<sp:5:1:0> I'll keep my <clr:0000>blessing of
clothing enhancement<clr:ffff> to myself.
Until I hear the <clr:0000>sound of a horn<clr:ffff>, bringing
some lively music into the world...

I'll never go outside again!
ComTalk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>I can
enhance your clothing <clr:0000>to the maximum<clr:ffff>.
ComTalk_040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>So you're the one who arranged those
soothing sounds for me?

I would have liked to be released by
someone...bigger, but...

...


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well...<sp:5:1:0> A slim little lad like you is fine, too,
I suppose.
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I moved here to be near a stable, or near
enough anyway, so I could grace more
travelers with my <clr:0000>blessings<clr:ffff>.
But now, until I hear the <clr:0000>sound of a horn<clr:ffff>,
bringing lively music into the world...

I'll never go outside again!
ComTalk_041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems the world is not so corrupted
as I thought. <sp:5:0:0>To thank you for opening
my eyes...
I can <clr:0000>enhance<clr:ffff> your <clr:0000>clothing<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>But, of course, I require the necessary
<clr:0000>materials <clr:ffff>to do it.
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can plead for me to appear all you
want. I won't leave my flower bud.

The world has been ruined by gloom and
is ruled by monsters.<sp:5:1:0> I'll keep my <clr:0000>blessing
of clothing enhancement <clr:ffff>to myself.
Until I hear the <clr:0000>sound of a horn<clr:ffff>, bringing
some lively music into the world...

I'll never go outside again!
ComTalk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, you've come here again? OK, let me
see your clothes.
ComTalk_042:
<snd:TalkPositive>My older sister Kaysa is at a stable near
the Gerudo region to the south.
ComTalk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>So long for now, I suppose?
Once you have some clothing you
want to upgrade, come back anytime.
ComTalk_044:
<snd:TalkPositive>My younger sister Cotera is at a stable
near <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff> in Necluda southeast
of here.
ComTalk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionNormal>You don't have enough rupees to make it
stronger. I can't work like this!
ComTalk_045:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm... <sp:5:1:0>There are four of us sisters, <sp:5:0:0>and
it seems like <clr:0000>two<clr:ffff> of them haven't yet
brought their power back into the world.
Once they return, I can make your clothes
even stronger.
ComTalk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All of my sisters have come out of their
flower buds?<sp:5:1:0> I cannot thank you enough.

Anytime you need our power,<sp:5:0:0> we'll
be waiting.
ComTalk_102:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>And how do you plan to pay for my
blessing? With all the rupees you
don't have?
ComTalk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>I wanted to enhance other
pieces of clothing,<sp:5:0:0> but that does
not seem possible.
ComTalk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You know you don't have the rupees for
that, right? My blessings aren't free!
ComTalk_046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:5:0:0>If you combine doubly enhanced apparel
with clothing of the same type,
a <clr:0000>mysterious power<clr:ffff> will take effect.
ComTalk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you get clothes and materials, or if
I receive support from my sisters,<sp:5:0:0> then
I can help you.
ComTalk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>My powers need rupees. Why don't you
try something else?
ComTalk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you get new clothes and materials,<sp:5:0:0>
you should return to me.
ComTalk_030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Even if I wanted to, you don't have
enough materials. Be on your way, and
think about bringing me what I need.
ComTalk_031:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What absurdity! You don't have enough
materials to enhance that!
ComTalk_009: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Then please choose some clothes for me.
ComTalk_032:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't make excuses... You haven't got
enough materials.
ComTalk_033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You don't have enough materials.
How about another piece of clothing?
ComTalk_035: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you...<sp:5:0:0>are you going to make ME wait?
ComTalk_038:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm... <sp:5:1:0>There are four of us sisters, <sp:5:0:0>and it
seems like <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> of them hasn't yet brought
her power back into the world.
Once she returns, I can make your
clothes even stronger.
ComTalk_039:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There we go. Oh, while you're here...


If you enhance an entire set of clothes
twice, it may bestow a <clr:0000>mysterious power<clr:ffff>
when you wear it.
This isn't true of everything I can
enhance, sadly...
ComTalk_022:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry, <sp:5:0:0>there are some clothes, even with
my powers, that cannot be enhanced...
ComTalk_023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry, but I can't enhance that clothing
item. Choose a different one.
